Almaza Bay Beach Town Chalet.description:
Featuring inner courtyard views, Almaza Bay Beach Town Chalet provides accommodation with a private beach area and a balcony, around 700 metres from Almaza Bay Beach. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

This apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms equipped with a walk-in shower. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

The nearest airport is Mersa Matruh International Airport, 39 km from Almaza Bay Beach Town Chalet.

\u0634\u0642\u0642 \u0645\u0635\u064a\u0.address: طريق شاطئ الأبيض العام بجتر قريه البلو بيتش - فندق الأبيض للقوات المسلحه, 51612 Marsa Matruh, Egypt
\u0634\u0642\u0642 \u0645\u0635\u064a\u0.description:
Situated in Marsa Matruh, شقق مصيفيه للإيجار بشركة لؤلؤة مطروح offers beachfront accommodation 300 metres from Matrouh White Beach and provides various facilities, such as a bar and barbecue facilities. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. The apartment features mountain views, a picnic area and a 24-hour front desk.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, sea views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower. A fridge, a stovetop and minibar are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are allergy-free.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment.

Matrouh Blue Beach is 1.3 km from شقق مصيفيه للإيجار بشركة لؤلؤة مطروح, while Obayed Matrouh Beach is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mersa Matruh International, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
